name: ChoiceAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open choice assistant.”
”Alexa, ask choice assistant for vacation assistant.”
”Alexa, ask choice assistant for appetizer assistant.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: choice assistant
des:
ChoiceAssistant guides you through making a decision, helping you determine which choice is best for you. ChoiceAssistant can advise you on all sorts of decisions, from where to go on your next U.S. vacation to what type of dog to adopt. Our community of experts is making assistants all the time, so the number of decisions ChoiceAssistant can help you make is constantly growing!


To get started, just say “Alexa, enable Choice Assistant!”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
